At Infinum, we develop and design great software for mobile and web. Our clients are large brands, banks, insurance companies, media publishers, mobile carriers and other companies who need professional software solutions. 
Many awards prove the quality of our work, the experts working here share their knowledge on our blog, and our Facebook and Instagram pages show how much fun we have while doing it. 
We're a bunch of young people, we appreciate humor, music, quality code, beautiful design and a friendly work atmosphere.
